ModMetaData.name: BoomMod Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iCj5o7O.png[/img]
Creatures will only explode on death when the killing blow is a gunshot, burn, another explosion or they are otherwise on fire at the time. This is a fork of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1504182014]BoomMod[/url] by Jaxe
The main difference is that this version works on all pawns that explode on death, for example the BoomBat from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1963681588]Vanilla Animals Expanded — Australia[/url]
- Added options for selecting exploding conditions - Works well with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2324221340]Predators Hunt Boom Critters[/url] by velcroboy333
Requested by Malminas
